name: Vampire Saviour
description:
The main theme of the game is now in place :)

Icons designed by @azafran_white :)

Rules... Stay out of the sun, and in the shade. Left and Right arrows to move, X to jump. Coffins decrease your clock counter. 

How quick can you do it?

Only a few levels right now, but hoping to knock 20+ out by the end of the jam. Maybe some more mechanics as well.

Let us know what you think in the comments.
